root.name: S.I.M.I.S.
root.description: OverviewS.I.M.I.S is a compilation developed and published by Bastian Schick and Matthias Domin for the Atari Lynx platform.GamesThe compilation contains four games and four tech demos developed by Bastian Schick and Matthias Domin.GamesSnakeByteInvadersMinesIsolationTech DemosThe four tech demos are under a menu titled "Specials".DungeonMarble Madness CloneW3D-DemoPoly-Demo
